title: Vegetarian Sweet and Sour Meatballs
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Combine eggs, Cheddar cheese, and cottage cheese in a bowl until well blended. Add pecans, ½ cup onion, salt, basil, and sage; stir in bread crumbs. Roll mixture into 2-inch balls; place in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Whisk ketchup, apricot jam, vegetable oil, vinegar, ¼ cup onion, oregano, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl; pour over meatballs.
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until meatballs are firm and sauce is thick and bubbly, 35 to 40 minutes.
